note.para: This installation procedure assumes you have already installed a working docker (see http://docker.io) environment.

section.para: Docker is a lightweight Jail (currently using LXC) that allows you to install and run publican without installing your main Linux installation with all its dependencies.

step.para: Download and install the svendowideit/publican container from https://index.docker.io/u/svendowideit/publican/: $ docker pull svendowideit/publican This will take some time, as it downloads a fedora based container, and then the dependencies needed for publican
